statements: UPDATE security_incident_logs SET employee_id = 101, description = 'Unauthorized access' WHERE incident_id = 1;

UPDATE security_incident_logs SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE incident_id = 1
UPDATE security_incident_logs SET incident_type = 'Data Breach', timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE security_incidents SET severity = 3 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE breach_records SET affected_records = 5000, breach_type = 'Data Breach' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE security_incidents SET severity = 3, description = 'High severity incident' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE breach_records SET affected_records = 100, description = 'Massive data breach' WHERE breach_type = 'Data Leak';
UPDATE SecurityIncidents SET incident_description = 'Data breach incident details' WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE BreachLogs SET breach_type = 'Unauthorized access' , employee_id = 205 , breach_description = 'Security breach detected' , breach_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE breach_id = 301;
UPDATE SecurityIncidents SET incident_date = '2022-06-30', incident_description = 'Data breach incident' WHERE incident_id = 1;
UPDATE BreachLogs SET breach_description = 'Unauthorized access to sensitive data', breach_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE breach_id = 3;
UPDATE security_incidents SET status='Resolved' WHERE id=101;
UPDATE users SET last_login='2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id=201;
UPDATE security_incidents SET status='Resolved', severity=3 WHERE id=101;
UPDATE users SET role='Admin', last_login='2022-09-15 10:00:00' WHERE user_id=201;
UPDATE security_incidents SET severity = 3 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE user_activities_logs SET activity_description = 'Logged out' WHERE id = 200;

UPDATE employee_logs SET log_description='Employee logged in from a new device', log_timestamp='2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE employee_id=200;
